about_the_game:
🏃‍♂️ Love Action? 🏃‍♀️

You're in for a treat! Blood Peace offers intense battles where your special abilities and reflexes will be your best weapons ⚡. Each level is a true battlefield where your survival depends on your agility and ability to improvise.

🔁 Rogue-lite with Infinite Replayability

In Blood Peace, every defeat is a new opportunity to come back stronger. Thanks to procedural generation, no run is ever the same! Explore dungeons full of secrets, face unique bosses, and collect increasingly powerful loot 🎁.

👹 Diverse and Dynamic Bestiary

Face off against formidable creatures! Each enemy has its own attacks and behaviors, forcing you to constantly adapt your strategies. From gigantic monsters to cunning foes, every fight is a new challenge for your brain and reflexes 🧠.

🔫 Weapons and Loot Galore

The world of Blood Peace is packed with incredible loot! Access a multitude of weapons, each with random attributes that can radically change your playstyle. Combine them to become an unstoppable force 🚀.

🕹️ Key Features:

  • Ultra-fast FPS Action 🎮: Shoot, dodge, and survive in epic battles.
  • Unique Gameplay ⭐: Enjoy a blend of numerous movements and hack'n slash elements.
  • Rogue-lite Exploration: Every defeat is a lesson. Come back stronger after every run.
  • 7 Unique Biomes 🌍: Explore varied environments, each with its own atmosphere and dangers.
  • Procedural Loot and Weapons 💣: Thousands of equipment combinations to build your class and adapt to any playstyle.
  • References and Easter Eggs 🐣: Discover jokes and pop culture nods hidden throughout the game.

🔥 Ready for Maximum Action?

Wishlist Blood Peace now and get ready for explosive action! 🔥

📝 Note:

  • The game is developed by a single person, independently and with love 💖.
  • Development is still ongoing, with an official release planned for 2026 📅.
  • You can participate in the adventure by sharing your feedback, ideas, and voting to influence the game's development. Join us on Discord or visit 🌐.

name: Blood Peace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8, 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Blood Peace is a fast-paced rogue-lite dungeon crawler where you embody a cybernetic warrior with extraordinary abilities. Engage in epic battles against a diverse bestiary across 7 unique biomes. Each playthrough generates a procedurally created world, ensuring infinite replayability.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support
